summary: The story of two outlaws and a bounty hunter in 1940s Manchuria and their rivalry to possess a treasure map while being pursued by the Japanese army and Chinese bandits.
cast: Song Kang-Ho|Lee Byung-Hun|Woo-sung Jung|Je-mun Yun|Seung-su Ryu|Young-chang Song|Byung-ho Son|Dal-su Oh|Chung-Ah Lee|Kwang-il Kim|Dong-seok Ma|Kyeong-hun Jo|Hang-soo Lee|Hyun Joong Kang|Sung-min Lee|Chang-sook Ryu|Young-mok Yun|Cheol-ho Yeom|Seung-won Seo|Deok-jae Jo|Kil-hyun Kim|Jin-young Noh|Il-yong Oh|Young-jae Kwak|Kijoon Hong|Seung-jae Jeon|Geum-Seong Kil|Yong-jae Cho|Myung-hun Yang|Jin-young Jung|Jae-seung Ryu|Man-ki Kim|Pil-joong Kim|Kyung-man Choi|Mi-nam Jeong|Ha-joon Kim|Han-sol Lee|Seung-Joon Lee|Seol-gu Lee|Seung-chu Kang|Rock-jin Choi|Seung-hyun Song|Kwang-su Lee|Jae-eun Kang|Sung-gyun Park|Woo-sang Yeom|Mavlyanov Jasurbek|Bana Tehrani Ali Asghar|Deligeer|Hakuryû|Shôken Kunimoto|Sang-woo Shin|Alexander Pavlov|Hong-soo Kim|Se-hyeong Jeong|Jae-eun Jun|Park Min-Young|Woo-jeong Oh|Seo-won Oh|Chan-hyung Kim|Sang-jae Yoo|Ki-hyun Choi|Jung-hyun Cha|Sung-woo Jung|Jung-man Son|Soo-Hyun Lee|Kwang-soon Jang|Dae-Sung Choi|Dae-won Kim|Hwa-seong Jo|Yu-Mi Ko|Jung-hoon Sung|Byung-gyu Kwak|Min-Jae Kim|Kwang-bok Park|Sang-gyu Son|Jae-hwan Shin|Sung-Ho Lee|Young-soo Lee|Yoo-soo Lee|Chang-soo Lee|Joo-hyun Lim|Seon-kyu Jin|Eun Se Ki|Sun-Young Kim|Ganna Pionova|Min Yeong|Soo-nam Kim|Yeon-ah Park|Woo-hyuk Choi|Sun-ah Kang|Jae-hyeon Park|Jin-woo Park|Jin-Hwan Son|Ji-won Uhm
title: El bueno, el malo y el raro
